entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few rain showers or flurries beginning near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
